hero.title: Building a Sustainable World
hero.description: Blockchain is often referred to as the second internet and is a groundbreaking technology that solves the challenges faced by traditional systems.

blockchain.title: Blockchain Is Often Referred To As
blockchain.description1: Blockchain is often referred to as the second internet and is a groundbreaking technology that solves the challenges faced by traditional systems. By utilizing blockchain, it becomes possible to prevent data tampering while perpetually preserving various activity histories.
blockchain.description2: This technology is used in the operation of cryptocurrencies (tokens) such as Bitcoin and Ethereum.
blockchain.description3: In this project, we focus on the sustainability of blockchain itself and aim to create a user-participatory sustainable economic zone by implementing it for activities and projects for the natural environment, as well as for idol activities.

project.title: In This Project, We Aim To Contribute
project.description1: In this project, we aim to contribute to the expansion of activities related to the development of new technologies and the conservation of existing resources.
project.description2: Reducing CO2 emissions is important, but at the same time, forest conservation activities that absorb CO2 are crucial, and we will focus on afforestation efforts.
project.description3: Furthermore, we will advance collaboration with projects working on the development of new-generation batteries (accumulators) that improve energy efficiency.
project.description4: In addition, we will promote collaboration and support with organizations involved in environmental protection, such as biomass power generation for creating clean energy, through our platform.

environment.title: As A Means To Make Environmental
environment.description1: As a means to make environmental activities enjoyable, we will incorporate idols into the initiative.
environment.description2: Idols are icons with significant social influence and serve as a source of daily comfort for their fans.
environment.description3: Utilizing their substantial social influence, we will collaborate and promote eco-friendly activities. Moreover, regardless of how much spotlight an idol may receive, the current reality is that they gradually fade out over time.
environment.description4: Our aim is to create a sustainable world in the idol industry, targeting idols from their early days to those who have graduated, ensuring longevity and continued relevance.

anime.title: Anime, idols, eco. Various projects are starting to get underway.

afforestation.title: Afforestation
afforestation.description1: The world's forest area is approximately 3.99 billion hectares, accounting for 30.6% of the total land area. However, the world's forests are continuously decreasing, with an annual reduction of 3.3 million hectares.
afforestation.description2: To stop this deforestation, it is necessary to actively promote afforestation activities.

evBattery.title: EV Battery
evBattery.description1: It has been a long time since the negative environmental impact of gasoline vehicles has been a concern, and strong regulations are being implemented worldwide, such as the European Commission in the EU planning to ban the sale of new gasoline vehicles from 2035 onwards.
evBattery.description2: Therefore, there is a demand for the production of batteries with lower CO2 emissions from the manufacturing stage, as well as measures to visualize the amount of reduction.

biomass.title: Biomass Power Generation
biomass.description1: Among clean energy sources, biomass power generation is receiving significant attention. Biomass power generation is a method of generating electricity by using the heat produced from burning materials such as wood chips and combustible waste.
biomass.description2: The waste heat generated from power generation can be effectively used for heating and hot water in surrounding areas, making it an ideal form of clean energy.

idol.title: Idol
idol.description1: In this project, Clip holders will be able to participate in the management of the idol group we produce.
idol.description2: Specifically, this includes involvement in the production of the idol group, participation in actual concerts and charity events, and a select group of users will be granted the right to co-create new songs with the idol group.

roadmap.title: Roadmap
roadmap.step6: Oct, 2024 : Start to develop Carbon Credit chain
